disable-chatcard-chances.name: Disable the chances on the chatcard
disable-chatcard-chances.hint: The module won't show the bar chances in chat anymore

disable-modifiers-dialog-chances.name: Disable the chances on the roll dialog
disable-modifiers-dialog-chances.hint: The module won't show the bar chances in the roll dialog anymore (the little window that opens wth all the modifiers)

disable-tooltips.name: Disable the tooltip
disable-tooltips.hint: The module won't show the tooltip when you hover on the bars

visibility-choice.name: Who can see the chances bar?
visibility-choice.hint: Default means that players can see the chances, only if they have the information (based on the system Pathfinder Second Edition setting -Metagame Information-)

hide-degree-labels.name: Hide the degree labels
hide-degree-labels.hint: Hides only the string (like Fail or your custom)

hide-crits.name: Hide the critical chances into their respective degree
hide-crits.hint: This means there are only 2 bars, (crit fail + fail) vs (success + crit)

critical-failure-label.name: Set Critical Failure custom label
critical-failure-label.hint: Set a custom label, leave blank to hide

critical-failure-color.name: Set Critical Failure custom color
critical-failure-color.hint: Set an RGB hexadecimal color like #FFFFFF

failure-label.name: Set Failure custom label
failure-label.hint: Set a custom label, leave blank to hide

failure-color.name: Set Failure custom color
failure-color.hint: Set an RGB hexadecimal color like #FFFFFF

success-label.name: Set Success custom label
success-label.hint: Set a custom label, leave blank to hide

success-color.name: Set Success custom color
success-color.hint: Set an RGB hexadecimal color like #FFFFFF

critical-success-label.name: Set Critical Success custom label
critical-success-label.hint: Set a custom label, leave blank to hide

critical-success-color.name: Set Critical Success custom color
critical-success-color.hint: Set an RGB hexadecimal color like #FFFFFF
